vsParam:
Listen carefully, Cresson.
As a knight, your sword must be always with you.

But we also need to prepare for circumstances in which
no handy weapon is available. Do you understand?

Under such circumstances, one option is to use
whatever around you as a weapon.

Captain, I see what you mean...
But this triangular rule...

It's your weapon for today!
Alright, you can use this triangular rule as your weapon today!

Ah, okay, I got it!
Let's begin!

What are they doing...
Why are they holding the triangular rules instead of swords...

Ha-ha... Cresson's a guard and not a student,
I think he has no access to the triangular rule.
No, it's must be an important training, too!
There... must be some valid reasons for that...

[px]!? Oh no,
[px] is infected by Tandrion!

Calm... calm down, Peppermint!
[px] must be tired, it must be it...

You, you guys are not very nice...
But, that's also because Tandrion do things too casually.
No no, no need to defend him...

[px], you know that, right?
Tandrion does things casually and acts recklessly, huh?...

... Uh? Ah, you guys.
Cresson, [px] and the guys are here.

What?
Ah, what's wrong? What can I do for you?

No, we are here to watch your training.
Go on, don't mind us.

? Alright. If so...
Sorry, Captain, please continue the training!

Let me think... We shall proceed to the next training.
I am getting a bit tired of this one.

What? Tired?
Captain, did I hear you wrong?

Ah, yes, you heard me wrong. Next training... right.
Kill the monsters around the Academy!

You pulled through all those tough trainings...
I believe you can handle this one too!

Oh, suddenly he comes up with a decent training!
I think he's just trying to hide his casualness...

N... No, I am not! Well, since you are here,
you guys can go with Cresson.

Uh——!?
Why would we accompany Cresson during his training!?

You want a reason, right?... Well.
Supervision! Right, I want you to supervise Cresson!

Cresson is still immature, I'd be worried if he goes alone.
So, just in case, just in case. Ha ha ha ha!

Gee, so fake...
I am sure he wants us to go so that we won't disturb him...

Ha-ha... He's right though, finding and killing the monsters
alone do make people worry... Let's just tag along.

I am sorry, guys!
Let's get ready and go!
